title: Rescue Me
description: Seattle socialite Julia Dorsey has it all prestige, money, magnificent Morgan horses, and a powerful, brilliant husband. But Julia's life is a nightmare of domestic violence and terror, and only an act of courage can save her. Will the price be too high?When mysterious Heck Dillon enters her life, Julia's fears return. Who is he? Can she trust him? As Dillon offers her quiet strength and protection, Julia begins to believe in hope for a new future, thanks to her discovery of an equine rescue in need. But the old life still haunts her and, before she can move forward, she must face her past.This tale of romantic suspense touches on two serious equine rescue and domestic violence.
author: Toni Leland
